title: Tagging emails with specific key words to make finding relevant emails easily
content:
I would like to add specific tags to my emails, e.g. key words/phrases like "DNA Match", "Chichester", etc. I have gigabytes of saved emails with valuable information, but finding things I know I have, is impossible.

How can I do that?

The colour code tags are useless due to limited number, and also because I colour code genealogy/family history emails as green, I have thousands of "green" emails. I need a better system.

If Thunderbird is not the right email client to use, what is?

title: Replies to my sent email, land in the Sent items folder, not the Inbox
content:
I'm new to Thunderbird so this behavior has me stumped. I sent an email to a friend. My friend received this email. When my friend replied to the email, their reply did not land in my Inbox but rather the Sent items folder. I'm using Outlook.com. I've unchecked "Save a copy in Sent Items" as I was getting duplicates in my sent folder. I've disabled Threaded view as I've seen that recommended as a solution.

I just tried it again and still, their replies end up in my Sent folder vs the Inbox. Obviously this isn't normal email behavior so I'm stumped.

If I close Thunderbird and do the same thing using the Outlook web client, replies correctly land in my inbox.

What am I doing wrong?

Thanks!
creator: user209994465199535585456402910546093466306

title: Tbird Not Repsonding
content:
Thunderbird latest auto-download version Windows 10 22H2 Mozilla Crash reports sent a few minutes ago.

After deleting around two thousand inbox messages last night, TBird crashed during the compacting cycle. I have not cleared the trash folder.

Several attempts to restart it have failed. Each time I am asked if I want to compact, I click Remind Me Later, so as not to further complicate startup.

The window opens and I can see the menu, tab and filter bars. Tabs have no text. The message window is blank, with no column dividers

The status bar freezes while looking for new messages on one of the account servers, and the blue progress bar is lit and static.

I cannot access any menus, all controls are non-responsive.

Task Manager shows CPU & Memory activity (they are not static). See images.

I know the compact cycle take take time. It's been at about 21 hours since the deletions.
creator: atscomms

title: how to load contact data into a unique new Tbird address book
content:
I want to use my Tbird address books as my contact data "warehouse." Can someone help me?

Tbird has a set of preferred data attributes for IMPORT into address books. I find articles and postings that discuss (1) create & open an addressbook; (2) browse & select the CSV data file; etc. Where do I find detailed preparation for a CSV that Tbird will digest?

On import, Tbird tries to match file column with Tbird preferred columns. This never works for me. I routinely see whole records with multiple "quoted", "fields" in one column but cannot find a reason why that happens.

Must I import an exact & complete Tbird CSV? Must column names match exactly in name and in order? May Tbird skip blank/empty columns where my data does not include info that Tbird wants?

After all of the above, my contact data is in numerous forms that I convert somehow that I can then obtain a CSV. I receive the data as email or shared document or some scanned to PDF or JPG. THANK YOU, LINUX for piped command chains and scripted work flow.

Thank You in Advance, ~~~0;-} Dan
creator: dan.st.andre

title: getting messages from pop server
content:
1.Running Thunderbird 115.6.0 64 bit on Windows 10. 2.Using Microsoft Defender as AntiVirus and I set Thunderbird profile folder to be excluded from AV. 3.Getting emails from a single Earthlink pop server account. Problem: When clicking Get Messages it works great except yesterday there was one single email on the pop server that would not download properly. It prevented all subsequent messages from downloading. It is a valid email and is not spam. When I searched for the message, it showed multiple times (about 50) in the Thunderbird Inbox. When I deleted the email from the pop server, everything works again. What is there about this messages that causes it to lockup the get message process? Thanks for your help, John

title: email from one aprticular adress have strated to disapear from inbox
content:
The last couple of days emails from one particular adress (mail send from or generated in our membershipsystem) have started to disapear from my inbox.

I'm not aware that any updates have been done since when it worked.

The mail shows in the inbox for maybe 5-10 sec and then puff without me doing anything or if I click away from inbox and back it's gone

I have checked my spam, the trash and my filters and I have done a search. Even ended up deleting my filters, to be sure.

I have made sure the email adress is not on any spam list. I even tried to make a filter where it would copy the mail to another folder to see if it would stay there (it didn't get copied).

The mail is also gone when I check directly on the webmail with my mail provider.

On my thunderbird I have three different email accounts from the same email provider. I tried sending the same mail to two of my accounts at the same time form this particular emailadress (I can acces the membershipsystem and send / generate mails from there). The mail was recieved and stayed on one account but not the other.

I'm running out of things to try - please help me.
creator: sekretariat22

title: newsgroup usenet non risultano alla ripartenza di Thunderbird
content:
Poiché dal 22.2.2024 Google ha deciso di abbandonare la sincronizzazione tra i suoi gruppi di discussione e quelli di usenet, ho l'esigenza di collegarmi direttamente con i gruppi di usenet. Per cui mi sono registrato con il server news.individual.net ed ho personalizzato thunderbird con l'account per i newsgroup, ho sottoscritto i gruppi di discussione a cui sono interessato, ho caricato i loro messaggi. E tutto è andato bene. Poi ho chiuso thunderbird e spento il pc, regolarmente. Ma quando l'ho fatto ripartire, non compariva più la lista dei gruppi di discussione che avevo sottoscritto, per cui ho dovuto attivare il mio account per i newsgroup, sottoscrivere i gruppi di discussione, caricare i messaggi, un'altra volta. Ho verificato di aver seguito correttamente le istruzioni di News.individual.net, ma non ho trovato errori. Ed ora ho trovato la soluzione tampone di chiudere il PC con la funzione "ibernazione", per non dover ricaricare tutto ogni volta che devo spegnere il PC.

Domanda: Che errore potrei aver commesso?
